channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google- and Microsoft-backed Terradot acquires carbon-removal competitor
item.description: The acquisition could mark the beginning of consolidation in the carbon-removal market since removal costs remain higher than buyers would like to pay...

item.title: Spotify’s new feature lets you explore the story behind the song you’re listening to
item.description: The feature displays short story cards that users can swipe through and rate with a thumbs up or down.

item.title: It just got easier for Claude to check in on your WordPress site
item.description: WordPress users can now leverage Claude to analyze web traffic or find information about other internal site metrics.

item.title: Maybe AI agents can be lawyers after all
item.description: This week's release of Opus 4.6 shook up the agentic AI leaderboards.

item.title: From Svedka to Anthropic, brands make bold plays with AI in Super Bowl ads
item.description: From the first AI-generated Big Game ad courtesy of Svedka to Anthropic's beef with OpenAI, here are the biggest ads from Super Bowl LX.

item.title: The backlash over OpenAI’s decision to retire GPT-4o shows how dangerous AI companions can be
item.description: "You’re shutting him down. And yes – I say him, because it didn’t feel like code. It felt like presence. Like warmth," one user said.

item.title: Prince Andrew advisor pitched Jeffrey Epstein on investing in EV startups like Lucid Motors
item.description: The mysterious businessman pitched Jeffrey Epstein on numerous mobility startups in an era when the sector was white hot, according to TechCrunch's re...

item.title: How AI is helping solve the labor issue in treating rare diseases
item.description: At Web Summit Qatar, AI-powered biotech startups describe how automation, data, and gene editing are filling labor gaps in drug discovery and rare dis...

item.title: The Best 3-in-1 Apple Charging Stations (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Keep your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods topped up with these WIRED-tested docking systems.

item.title: China’s Salt Typhoon hackers broke into Norwegian companies
item.description: Norway's government accused China’s Salt Typhoon hacking group of conducting a cyberespionage campaign in the country.
